claim: Flublok contains 3x the hemagglutinin (HA) antigen content of standard-dose flu vaccines, which has been linked to greater immunogenicity vs standard-dose flu vaccines.

verified_evidence.quote: in January 2024, vaccination with a higher dose recombinant flu vaccine may induce a more robust antibody response than egg based standard dose vaccines.

The factual content and meaning are preserved.. The quote directly states that a higher dose recombinant flu vaccine (which refers to Flublok, as established elsewhere in the document) may induce a more robust antibody response than standard-dose, egg-based vaccines. This supports the claim that increased HA antigen content (3x in Flublok) is associated with greater immunogenicity compared to standard-dose flu vaccines.
